products.title: Cavendish Navy Roman Blind
products.metadescription:
With the look of denim but with a fabric thats ever so softer, the cavendish navy roman blind adds a serene touch to interiors, but with an extra sense of snugness and calm.  
Surprisingly, this tone works best in spaces with lighter dcor, such as sky blue or even cotton white

products.title: Choices Cavendish Powder Blue Roller Blind
products.metadescription: If youre looking for a light, bright touch of colour for your home and if youre a lover of blue, then this gorgeous roller may be just right for you.   Cool as the hue may be, theres a certain cosy softness about this blind too thanks to its snuggly texture and tactile finish.
products.productdescription: If youre looking for a light, bright touch of colour for your home and if youre a lover of blue, then this gorgeous roller may be just right for you.
